title: gonna lose more lp because the game wont launch.......
body: just happened again. game gose through selection and the 2nd menu dose not pop up. why has riot not fixed this yet. as it stands ive been waiting for 4 minutes for the 2nd window to open showing my download progress for the upcoming game...

replies.body: Straight up, always have to open task manager and relauch.
Riot needs to fix this, but in the interim you have to kill the client in task manager then relaunch it and it will take you to the loading screen.
